steps.title: Processing
steps.content: In this section you recieve the item from supplier,which are ordered

steps.title: Access Controll Level
steps.content: Customize Aceess Controll on Submitted Orders.Here you can edit the access control permission

steps.title: Mark_processed
steps.content: If you recieve the items than click on Mark_processed.If you did not recieve the items in exact quantity that you have ordered then you have to change in Recieved Quantity
